website_summaries.verdict: A highly compact world featuring a plethora of activities for Polly Pocket and Shani that all take place inside a cupcake.
pros: This Polly Pocket set features an entire two-story home fit inside a cupcake
There is a kitchen complete with sink, range, and refrigerator
The play room features video games, dancing, and singing, and the set also includes a tiny motorbike
cons: Some of the movable parts may not hold up very well

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the entire line of the newly released Polly pockets so I have a good mix to compare with. I also own a few vintage Polly pocket compacts from 1989. This cupcake is super cute. There are some paint flaws on it, but overall it’s a cute little cupcake. My biggest complaint on all the newly released Polly pockets is the clasp for opening. It’s cheap and hard to open. One of them has already popped off. Really wish they would have kept the vintage concept. Those clasps are amazing and durable. The new cheap clasps will break easy...
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Broke 20 minutes after opening
customer_reviews.text: This has been open 20 minutes and the hand ripped off the doll with regular use. I was watching my 6 year old play with it. She set it on our rug and the hand snagged the rug and actually ripped off. This does not meet the quality of vintage Polly Pocket.
customer_reviews.author: RJH123

customer_reviews.title: Polly pocket— definitely better than shopkins
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old and 2 year old both love the new Polly Pockets! The one that looks like a flamingo is more popular among them for daily play, but I would also recommend this one. Maybe an older kid would appreciate it a bit more. It’s a little hard to get open, but that also means it withstands drops. I love it— especially when compared to the shopkins mini sets that are a lot like these.
customer_reviews.author: Caspergirl92

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I'm an 80's kid so I grew up with the original PP. These are great quality and adorable - can't wait to give them to my DD for christmas! (I bought 4 different versions).
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: My 3 1/2 year old is having so much fun playing with these
customer_reviews.text: These new Polly Pockets are so cute. My 3 1/2 year old is having so much fun playing with these. It has lots of detail and things to do even though they're so small. This set is really cute and so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: FallIsMyFav

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay product. Bought for my daughter and it just didn't hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Blast of fun from the past.
customer_reviews.text: So so so cute. My daughters have been playing with this for hours and I’m having a lot of nostalgia.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Coviello

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger set than the original Polly Pockets when I was a kid. Not sure the word Pocket should be on there anymore! My 4 year old seems to love it so far. I'm not a fan of the stickers that they stick on. I don't see that lasting very long. Our Polly Pickets had little indentions that the clicked into. That seems like a better idea. My 4 year old has trouble getting it to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: Sad that Pollies can withstand only delicate handling
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves Polly Pocket Cupcake, she plays with them all day. She is 2 years old and can handle little things, does not put them in her mouth, however she does pull lightly on their arms. This new material does not withstand any pulling, and so we end up with a group of amputees. I really wish the pollies were made out of sturdy, non stretch material, not this gummy nonsense. We constantly have to buy additional Pollies.
customer_reviews.author: ER RN

customer_reviews.title: Tiny dolls
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little set but I'm going to have to return it.. I got it for a 3 year old but the characters are much too tiny for that age.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: It's a TINY world
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give to my granddaughter on her 4th birthday this summer. I remember having a doll in a locket when I was a kid. This looks like loads of fun, with many things of interest to keep an imaginative child busy. However, all the pieces are tinier than I imagined. The packaging says 4+. I think most 4 year olds don't have the finger agility for such tiny items and suggest that it is more appropriate for 5+.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Polly pocket
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute its will be so much fun,for granddaughter for christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Roehl

customer_reviews.title: Slightly different from when I was a kid but a big hit!
customer_reviews.text: At first when opening this I thought "wow these doll figures are way bigger than when I was a kid" and also, they didn't bend which I found odd. But, after seeing my 2 year old play with it, I'm realizing they are better this way. Their feet stick somehow to the floor in there, so they don't fall around. For the dance floor, she can stay standing and you can flick her to dance with your finger. Very pleased and will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: CMT

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It really brought me back in time seeing a Polly pocket. My daughter absolutely loves it! They have these cool sticky feet on them now that can make them stick on the stage and on various places. If you are thinking about getting a first Polly pocket this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Philly 2 liberty

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loved getting this and it’s great for travel. She’s had it for a month (?) now and still plays with it and surprising hasn’t lost all the pieces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun and a great quiet toy we take to church!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this. I was really nervous about the tiny little pieces, but out of nostalgia I had to get it for her. As long as your child is into imaginative play I think they will love it regardless of the age! Children can never have enough toys that encourage imaginative play and I think polly pockets do exactly like. Plus, it doesn't have any sounds! Which is a mom for this mom!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: The original packaging was damaged and falling apart. This is a Christmas gift and it looks like it's already been opened :(
customer_reviews.author: Tarah

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Polly pocket toy
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this! She played happily with this and may collect the other ones too. This was affordable, and cute. But keep in mind it is for a mature child, as it has very tiny pieces, not for children who put things in their mouth or have infant siblings.
customer_reviews.author: MarieTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Make a cute gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, they provided stickers that you can place the dolls to stand on; so they can stand and even at angled positions. Those stickers are great! I hope this will keep my 3 year old daughter somewhat busy on our flight. Looking to purchase more! Miss the original poly pocket still though!
customer_reviews.author: ImReviewingStuff

customer_reviews.title: Great girl gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has been enjoying this gift and plays with it frequently. I was worried about the small pieces getting lost but the cases closes up and holds all the small parts securely. Its durable and great for alone of friend play.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Craig

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Not a small as the Polly pockets that I had when I was a kid but pretty similar and it compacts together brings back good memories my daughter couldn't wait to get it for Christmas I am happy that we purchased it all works nice material
customer_reviews.author: Jakilyn driver

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friends daughter and she loved them! She was so excited to play with her polly pockets. It was her favorite Christmas gift. I really like how they come with stickers that polly will stick to so you have have her stand places and she will actually stay!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily misplaced
customer_reviews.text: The hinge broke the first day my daughter got this. She propped it up against something and continued to play. However, I would not buy this again. The pieces are very small and easily lost. I don't think most young children (mine is 5) could keep all the parts together for long.
customer_reviews.author: Calogero Gambino

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Likes Polly Pocket
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 1/2 year old granddaughter who recently discovered Polly Pocket, and this was a gift for her. She enjoys playing with it. It has tiny parts that could easily get lost, but that's my only negative. Otherwise, it's small, portable, and it was a successful gift purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carousel

customer_reviews.title: Happy to see these making a comeback!
customer_reviews.text: When our daughter was little she loved her Polly Pockets, most of them I saved for her, now her little girl plays with them. I was happy to see them returning as I think most little girls will enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Darling Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old as I remembered my sisters enjoying them when they were kids. The toy didn't disappoint. The dolls are rubber which was nice and there was a few other small pieces. While I would recommend this toy I would not suggest it if your child likes to put objects in their mouth (choking hazard) or if you think they would lose the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Family

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing poly pockets and I wanted to share that experience with my 4yr old daughter. She loves it! Takes it anywhere we go. It’s perfect for staying at grandpas house or traveling in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Polly Pocket
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (4) loves Polly Pockets. They keep her busy for awhile. The pieces are pretty small, so they would be easy to lose or could be a choking hazard for one too little. Overall good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact toy
customer_reviews.text: We love these little Polly pockets! They are a great grab and go toy, perfect for church or at a restaurant. The pieces are very little bit they all fit inside like a puzzle. My 3 year old wants more!
customer_reviews.author: Akicia R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So fun! My 9 year old loves this new generation Polly pockets! And honestly I’m a little jealous. Haha! They are so much cooler than when I was her age. Having the feet grip the stickers is genius, and the accessories are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashmm18

customer_reviews.title: Cute and portable
customer_reviews.text: Loved these as a little girl, now my niece will love them too. She was asking for one and I was so excited to get one at such a good price. It's cute and portable enough to fit in the backpack purse we got her.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fun you can carry
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like? It’s detailed, it’s extremely portable, it has its own doll. Little girls of this generation find it as appealing as we do.
customer_reviews.author: Jenrus

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it and there are different kinds!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter (6) and her cousins (5 & 10) they went crazy for them. Not like the original Polly pockets these ones have sticky feet that stick to stickers provided. I thought that was annoying but the girls said that was the coolest part. Lol I’d totally buy different ones again
customer_reviews.author: Naomom

customer_reviews.title: But didn't return it cuz she liked it anyway
customer_reviews.text: The box was correct picture ( beach one) but I got this! So I paid more! But didn't return it cuz she liked it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY

customer_reviews.title: Great toy- quality so so
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old got this for Christmas and she adores it. My biggest problem is quality, I grew up with the old Polly pockets and even 20 years later they are holding up better than this one is. That being said, it’s a great toy for her imagination and she’s happy, so I am.
customer_reviews.author: Frog819

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy for traveling
customer_reviews.text: If your little is always in imagination land then she will love this toy and so will you when your in the car and she's perfectly distracted by her toy.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Simple gift and the birthday girl loves the toy. Great for travel since the toy itself is the travel case.

customer_reviews.title: Cute

I tired to use it as a teaching moment about kindness towards those who are handicapped, which was well received. At the end of the day though, she really wants Polly to not have a torn leg!

product_meta.title: Polly Pocket Donut Pajama Party Compact [Amazon Exclusive]
product_meta.description: It's time for sweet treats and musical fun with the Polly Pocket Pocket World Cupcake Compact! The compact is shaped like a cupcake and opens to a themed cafe world with sweet treats and fun performances featuring micro Polly and Shani dolls. Compact also features these secret reveals: kitchen/cooking area has a secret surprise reveal with a fridge door that opens; upstairs there is a door that opens to reveal a surprise! In the cafe, lift the table up to reveal a performance stage area where Polly doll can perform with a microphone. Place her on the stage and move the button left to right and watch Polly doll move to the groove! Now it's time for a delivery and Polly and Shani dolls can jump on their delivery scooter and zip away to deliver their sweet treats! Compact is small enough to take anywhere, anytime for sweet Polly Pocket adventures. Includes Polly Pocket Pocket World Cupcake Compact with secret reveals, micro Polly and Shani dolls, sticker sheet and accessories. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: The Polly Pocket Pocket World Cupcake Compact opens to a themed café world that is sweeter than sweet!
It's time for sweet treats and fun performances with micro Polly and Shani dolls.
Compact features fun secret reveals: the kitchen/cooking area has a fridge door that opens and an upstairs door opens to reveal a surprise!
In the café, lift the table up to reveal a performance stage area where Polly doll can perform with a microphone.
On stage, place Polly doll on the performance area and move the button left to right to watch her move to the groove!
​The calls are coming in now—it's delivery time and Polly and Shani dolls jump on their scooter to deliver their sweet treats!
​Compact is small enough to take anywhere, anytime for sweet Polly Pocket adventures.
​Includes Polly Pocket Pocket World Cupcake Compact with secret reveals, micro Polly and Shani dolls, sticker sheet and accessories.​
